title: Ticket #4411: condor_advertise -multi should block until the collector has added all
description:
condor_advertise -multi can send multiple ads to the collector in a relatively short amount of time, but those ads will actually be processed by the collector one at a time while doing other work in between each ad. So on a busy collector this can take a long time for the ads to show up. We have seen 291 ads take more than 10 minutes to be read by the collector out of the message stream.

It would be better feedback to the user if condor_advertise could be told to wait until the collector had read the ads before returning. Because the behavior of not waiting is long-standing. We will make this an opt-in behavior via a new command line argument -wait. -wait will imply -tcp since that is required to make this feature work without changing the collector.
